title: GCF of Terms
text: Find the greatest common factor of all the terms of the polynomial.

title: Multiply Common Factors
text: Multiply the terms shared by both expressions.\n$$GCF=2\times2\times2$$\n$$GCF=8$$

title: Write each Term as a Product using GCF
text: Rewrite $$8y$$ and $$16$$ as products of their GCF, $$8$$.\n$$8y+16$$\n$$8y+8\times2$$

title: Reverse Distributive Property
text: Use the reverse Distributive Property to factor the expression.\n$$8\left(y+2\right)$$
